titleStmt.title: An account of severall things that passed between His Sacred Majesty and Richard Hubberthorne Quaker on the fourth of June 1660 After the delivery of George Fox his letter to the King.
titleStmt.author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for M.S. and are to be sold at the booksellers shops,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
